title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When connecting a Derby database in the Data Source section of the Available Items sector, the column icons do not appear.
EB: In the Available Items sector, when expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
